title: Worth it.
review:
Brilliant use of imagery and foreshadowing. The cast is phenomenal. 
The movie is a ritual, not a series of events. Tense and disturbing, you won't see the end coming.

title: Pure terror.
review: In my opinion probably one of the greatest movies ever made. The casting, the effects, acting(that husky! ), the setting. From beginning to end, every time i watch this movie, I'm on the edge of my seat. Do yourself the favor and watch.
